fullDescription.intro: FisTree generates a FIS using "Fistree" FisPro Function. It generates the FIS from a configuration (e.g. configuration generated by Hfpsr Node) and a dataset. Click here for more informations.

option.name: Membership significance threshold for data items

fullDescription.option: the membership significance threshold for data items (default=0.2)

option.name: Tolerance in case of ambiguous classification at node

fullDescription.option: the tolerance in case of ambiguous classification at node (default=0.1)
the maximum tree depth (default=0, maximum depth)

option.name: Minimum relative entropy/deviance gain for splitting node

fullDescription.option: the minimum relative entropy/deviance gain for splitting nodes (default=1e-6)
the entropy gain type (0=absolute entropy gain, 1=relative entropy gain (default=absolute))
the tree pruning type (0=no pruning, 1=tree will be pruned using a performance criterion-full split removal, \n2=tree will be pruned using a performance criterion-leaf pruning (default=no pruning))

option.name: Relative performance loss tolerated during pruning

fullDescription.option: the relative performance loss tolerated during pruning (default=0.0)

option.name: Minimum coverage level required during pruning

fullDescription.option: the minimum coverage level required during pruning (default=0.90)
